parameters.name: BackupGatewayId
parameters.description:
The ID of the backup gateway. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to Agent.

parameters.name: BackupObjects
parameters.description: The backup objects. This parameter is optional if SourceEndpointInstanceType is set to Agent. In all other scenarios, this parameter is required. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup plan. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A string that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. This prevents repeated request submissions.

parameters.name: CrossAliyunId
parameters.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used for cross-account backup. Call the [DescribeRestoreTaskList](~~2869838~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: CrossRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the RAM role that is created for cross-account backup. Call the [DescribeRestoreTaskList](~~2869838~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointDatabaseName
parameters.description:
The database name.

- This parameter is required if the database type is PostgreSQL or MongoDB.

- This parameter is required if SourceEndpointInstanceType is set to Agent and the database type is MSSQL.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointIP
parameters.description:
The database endpoint. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to Express, Agent, or Other.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceID
parameters.description:
The ID of the database instance. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to RDS, ECS, DDS, or Express.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointInstanceType
parameters.description:
The location of the database. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter. Valid values:

- **RDS**

- **ECS**

- **Express**: A database connected over a leased line, VPN Gateway, or Smart Access Gateway.

- **Agent**: A database connected through a backup gateway.

- **DDS**: An ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance.

- **Other**: A database connected using an IP address and a port number.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointOracleSID
parameters.description: The Oracle system ID (SID). This parameter is required if the database type is Oracle.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPassword
parameters.description:
The password.

This parameter is optional if the database type is Redis, or if SourceEndpointInstanceType is set to Agent and the database type is MSSQL. In all other scenarios, this parameter is required.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointPort
parameters.description:
The database port. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to Express, Agent, Other, or ECS.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointRegion
parameters.description:
The region of the database. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

> This parameter is required if **SourceEndpointInstanceType** is set to RDS, ECS, DDS, Express, or Agent.

parameters.name: SourceEndpointUserName
parameters.description:
The database account. Call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of this parameter.

This parameter is optional if the database type is Redis, or if SourceEndpointInstanceType is set to Agent and the database type is MSSQL. In all other scenarios, this parameter is required.
